response.overview: Bram, a restless man, questions the source of his unease. One day, a mysterious figure appears, offering answers to his lingering worries, only to lead him into unconsciousness. When Bram awakens, he begins to uncover the truth through fragments of photographic paper he uses on his own camera.
response.tagline: Nothing we own is truly ours.
response.title: Portrait of Smiling People
